items.content_html: I’m happy to announce that not only will I be attending API the Docs in Paris on April 24th, but my talk proposal “To SDK or not to SDK?” has been accepted by the conference committee. Currently I’m working on the talk and look very much forward to giving it in Paris soon.
After long consideration, I decided to create a hosted Microblog on micro.blog. Now I need to set this thing up.
